description: A sweet and spicy sweet potato salad with chickpeas and a spicy sriracha lime peanut sauce. Easy to make and gluten-free and dairy-free.
keywords: spicy peanut sauce, sweet potato noodles, sweet potato salad
name: SWEET POTATO NOODLE SALAD WITH SRIRACHA LIME PEANUT SAUCE
recipeIngredient: salt and black pepper to taste
3 tablespoon peanut butter (we recommend natural and creamy)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the 1 tbsp coconut oil in a large skillet on medium heat and add the spiralized sweet potato and chickpeas. Stir to coat in the oil and cook until the potato softens to the consistency of noodles. They should be soft and malleable, not mushy. Remove from the pan and put in a large bowl and refrigerate while you make the sauce.
